meanings.sent1: Eating too much candy can be detrimental to your teeth.
meanings.sent2: Not wearing a helmet while biking can be detrimental to your safety.
meanings.sent3: Forgetting your umbrella on a rainy day can be detrimental to your dryness.
meanings.sent4: Ignoring warning signs can be detrimental to your well-being, like walking into a storm blindfolded.
meanings.sent5: Leaving food out in the sun for too long can have a detrimental effect on its freshness.

meanings.sent1: Excessive sun exposure can be detrimental to your skin.
meanings.sent2: Smoking is detrimental to your health in the long run.
meanings.sent3: Wearing wet socks all day can be detrimental to your comfort.
meanings.sent4: Lack of exercise can be detrimental to your overall fitness level.
meanings.sent5: Procrastination can have a detrimental impact on your productivity.
